mapper.select: SELECT p.product_number as productNumber, i.image_src as imageSrc, product_name as productName, product_price as productPrice, category_number as categoryNumber, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_reply pr WHERE pr.product_number = p.product_number) as reviewCount FROM product p, image i WHERE p.product_number = i.product_number AND category_number=#{category_number} AND image_order=1

SELECT p.product_number as productNumber, p.product_name as productName, p.product_price as productPrice, i.image_src as imageSrc FROM product p, image i WHERE p.product_number = i.product_number AND p.product_number=#{product_number} AND image_order=1
SELECT image_src as imageSrc FROM image WHERE product_number=#{product_number} AND not image_order = 1
